text: Ralph Michael Ineson (; born 15 December 1969) is an English actor. He is known for his deep Yorkshire-accented voice. He is best known as Chris Finch in the BBC sitcom The Office (2001). He also appeared as William in The Witch (2015), Dagmer Cleftjaw in Game of Thrones (2012), Amycus Carrow in the final three Harry Potter movies, Nikolai Tarakanov in the HBO historical drama miniseries Chernobyl (2019), the main character in The Green Knight (2021), Cid in the video game Final Fantasy XVI (2023), Dr. Wilhelm Sievers in Nosferatu (2024) and the villain Galactus in The Fantastic Four: First Steps (2025). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from York
title: Ralph Ineson
